creditline: Gift of Kenneth and Sally Leafman Appelbaum
description: incised inscription on stem; hammered and stamped organic designs below stem, above stem and on finial; openwork cone with floral designs below finial; 10 chains with bells at bottom, 5 at top; affixed to plexi mount
dimension: 18 3/8 x 4 x 4 in. (46.67 x 10.16 x 10.16 cm) (without mount)
title: Rimmonim (Torah finial) (one of a pair)
